ch0061_00_kikuko/0101_0701_01_10:
If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m so happy to see you here!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0101_0701_02_10:
Keep up with your training! If you do,
you’ll surely get stronger and stronger!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0701_01_10:
It’s like the whole town is celebrating with the
PML! No matter how old I get, this still gets my
blood pumping!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0701_02_10:
Strong Trainers from regions all over are
gathering here.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0701_03_10:
I’m here to prove that I’m still in my prime when
it comes to battling!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0702_01_10:
I’d be more excited if that old duff Oak were still
competing, too, though.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0701_02_10:
She eats a lot and loves to laugh.
She’s a real lively one.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0701_03_10: She’s gentle and cute. Such a good Pokémon!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0701_04_10: She does like to make mischief, too, though.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0702_01_10:
When she tries to sneak up on me for some
sort of prank, I have to be quick on my feet to
dodge her.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0702_02_10:
For Gengar, being mischievous is just how
she plays with me. By now, I’m used to it.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_01_10:
Pasio is the place to be right now,
but night will fall here, too.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_02_10:
Even in the brightest of light, there is always
darkness lurking nearby.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_03_10:
On nights when shadows seem to move on
their own and cold winds are blowing, take
care to watch for what’s behind you.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_04_10:
Mind that ominous lights don’t come to steal
your soul away.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0702_01_10:
How well can you handle
Ghost-type Pokémon, child?
ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0702_02_10:
They can sense a weak heart and will take
advantage of it. You must always have a
strong heart.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0702_03_10:
Once you’ve grown close to one,
there’s no longer anything to be afraid of.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0701_01_10:
Golbat in the Kanto region look scary,
but when you get used to them,
they can be quite sweet.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0701_02_10:
They’ll come right down and land on your
head and give you playful little bites.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0701_03_10:
If you’re not watching them closely, though,
they’ll start to suck your blood, so you have
to keep an eye on them.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0702_01_10:
For as big as their mouths are,
Golbat have pretty short fangs.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0702_02_10:
But you still need to be careful around them.
Their fangs are thick, so it’s tough to get
them out once they’ve sunk them into you.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0702_03_10:
Although that is one of the things I find cute
about them.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_01_10:
Why did you decide to become a
Trainer, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_02_10:
As long as you have a good reason,
you’ve got nothing to worry about.
ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_03_10:
Believe in yourself, don’t forget what you’re
doing this for, and keep moving forward!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_04_10: Keep on battling no matter how old you get!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0702_01_10:
That old duff Oak chose to use his talents on
research instead. What a waste!
ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0702_02_10:
If you’re a stronger Trainer than other people,
you should keep battling as long as you live!
ch0061_00_kikuko/1701_0701_01_10:
Aha! Great timing—I have something
for you.
ch0061_00_kikuko/1701_0701_02_10:
This is one of my favorite items.
I’m sure you’ll be able to put it to good use.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve been having Pokémon battles for a
very long time.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_02_10: I’ve had times when my skills couldn’t cut it.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_03_10:
But you can’t give up at times like those!
You have to keep battling again and again
until you win!
ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_04_10: If you give up, you’ll never grow as a Trainer!
ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0702_01_10:
You’re still so young, and that’s precisely
why you have so many more battles
ahead of you.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0702_02_10:
So take on as many of those battles as you can.
That’s the only way you’ll get stronger, child!
ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0701_01_10:
When I was young, I was reckless at times,
and I had the perfect rival.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0701_02_10: And now I’ve got you youngsters.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0701_03_10: I wonder how much fun I’ll have against you.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_01_10:
The man I accepted as my rival was
really strong.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_02_10: And now he’s just some old duff...
ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_03_10:
Well, at least you’ve got some pluck.
I don’t think you’ll turn out like him.
ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_04_10:
You’re not a Trainer if you don’t battle!
He really is such a waste of talent...
ch0061_00_kikuko/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning, child.
Make sure you train hard today!
ch0061_00_kikuko/3002_0701_01_10:
Did you sleep well last night?
I hope no wandering Pokémon
came by to eat your dreams.
ch0061_00_kikuko/3003_0701_01_10:
Remember—even during the day,
darkness is just around the corner.
Don’t let your guard down.
ch0061_00_kikuko/3004_0701_01_10:
How’s your training going?
Don’t forget to take a break
every now and then.
ch0061_00_kikuko/3005_0701_01_10:
If you’re outside on a dark night, remember to
watch your back and never trust your shadow.
ch0061_00_kikuko/3006_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon’s energy always shoots up
as soon as the sun goes down.
